name: The Shapeshifters
description:
This is a game made for the UGJ 2020

You play as an shapeshifter that is trying to escape the lab where they are expirementing on it.

The conection with the theme is that the shapeshifters can shift between 2 shapes

How to play:

- WASD to move

- Space to shapeshift

- Mouse to shoot
